ringer.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who rings church bells or hand bells
ringer.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a piece of equipment that makes a ringing noise
ringer.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Turn down the ringer on your phone.
ringer.translation[0].definitions[2].def: someone who pretends not to have a skill that they really have, in order to play on a team, enter a competition etc
